name: CPA Australia
description: Completion: 5/5
FR: HD
EG: Credit
DF: Credit
SMA: Credit
GLS: Credit

name: CPA Taiwan
institution: Ministry of Examination and Financial Supervisory Commission (FSC)
description: The CPA license is issued by Taiwanese government authorities after passing the national high-level written examination.
Ministry of Examination: administers the CPA high-level exam.
Financial Supervisory Commission (FSC): oversees licensing approval and regulation.

name: Prototype Solution 3rd in SLB Data Science Hackathon
institution: Associated with The University of Western Australia

name: KPMG Academic Competition
description: KPMG International Limited is a multinational professional services network and one of the Big Four accounting organizations.
Each June, KPMG holds an academic competition at my university to recognize professional and practical knowledge.
Candidates answer intermediate accounting questions under time limits.
My team won the championship, highlighting our teamwork and professionalism.

name: XBRL Academic Winter Camp
institution: Issued by Taiwan Stock Exchange Corporation
description: XBRL (eXtensible Business Reporting Language) is a global framework for exchanging business information.
I attended the Taiwan Stock Exchange XBRL camp (Jan 19-22, 2015), which included two and a half days of training and a competition on the third day.
We won third place.

name: CCU AIT Camp Lecturer
institution: Issued by National Chung Cheng University, Department of Accounting and Information Technology
description: Invited as a lecturer for the fifth accounting summer camp on July 10, 2016.
Designed an interactive game, Fraud and Fraudit, to teach accounting concepts to high school students.
Teams earned credits by answering questions, then presented financial statements and narratives to win funding.
Participants acting as accountants identified potential fraud and called "BLUFF" when a scandal was detected.

name: Excellent Teaching Assistant
institution: Issued by National Chung Cheng University
